metadata.title: CVE-2019-11039 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Function iconv_mime_decode_headers() in PHP versions 7.1.x below 7.1.30,7.2.x below 7.2.19 and 7.3.x below 7.3.6 may perform out-of-buffer read dueto integer overflow when parsing MIME headers. This may lead to informationdisclosure or crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11039` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.2 - 7.2.19-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libphp7.2-embed - 7.2.19-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
php7.2 - 7.2.19-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
php7.2-bcmath - 7.2.19-0ubuntu0.18.04.1

criterions.comment: php7.2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.2.19-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
